page.title: 05Traffic survey in Rawreth
page.content: This survey was conducted on the new A130 and a joining side road(oldA130). The traffic flow was counted at 8.00AM -8.30AM and then at 10.30AM-11.00AM. The totals were:A130_8.00-8.30=917 vehicles,A130_10.30-11.00=975 vehicles side_8.00-8.30=62 vehicles,side_10.30- 11.00=85 vehicles.Conclusions:1.A130 busier because wider/faster and leads to A127,Chelmsford,London,Southend. Ajoining road serves only Battles- -bridge village.2.There were more cars than lorries and vans,1637 compared to 402,because people probably go to work in cars.3.The busiest time was mid- -morning:because there is no clear rush hour,people may avoid what they thought was the busiest time.
